mapper.sql:
SELECT B.BNUM ,B.BTITLE ,B.BCONTENT ,B.BDATE ,B.TEXT ,M.MNICK ,B.THUMIDX FROM ( SELECT RNUM, BNUM, RCONTENT, MID, RDATE FROM TB_REPLY WHERE 1=1
AND RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{params.searchVal}||'%'
UNION ALL SELECT RNUM , BNUM, RRCONTENT, MID, RRDATE FROM TB_RREPLY WHERE 1=1
AND RRCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{params.searchVal}||'%'
) A, TB_BOARD B, TB_MEMBER M WHERE A.BNUM = B.BNUM AND B.MID = M.MID GROUP BY B.BTITLE, B.BNUM, B.BCONTENT ,B.BDATE, B.TEXT ,M.MNICK ,B.THUMIDX
